10370003.name: Rhythm from artificial pacing
10370003.description: An EKG rhythm resulting from an artificial pacemaker.

111975006.name: Prolonged QT interval
111975006.description: An EKG finding indicating a longer than normal QT interval.

164889003.name: ECG: Atrial Fibrillation
164889003.description: A common arrhythmia characterized by rapid and irregular beating of the atria.

164890007.name: EKG: Atrial Flutter
164890007.description: A type of supraventricular tachycardia, marked by recurrent regular atrial contractions.

164909002.name: EKG: Left Bundle Branch Block
164909002.description: A delay in the conduction of electrical impulses to the left side of the heart.

164917005.name: EKG: Q Wave Abnormal
164917005.description: Presence of abnormal Q waves indicating possible myocardial infarction.

164934002.name: EKG: T Wave Abnormal
164934002.description: Abnormalities in the T wave shape or amplitude on an EKG.

164947007.name: Prolonged PR Interval
164947007.description: An irregular heart rhythm, often indicating a block in electrical conduction.

251146004.name: Low QRS Voltages
251146004.description: Indicates low electrical activity in the heart, which may suggest underlying heart disease.

270492004.name: First Degree Atrioventricular Block
270492004.description: A delay in conduction through the AV node, leading to a prolonged PR interval.

284470004.name: Premature Atrial Contraction
284470004.description: Early heartbeats originating from the atria, often benign but may indicate underlying issues.

39732003.name: Left Axis Deviation
39732003.description: An EKG finding indicating a shift in the heart's electrical activity, which can be normal or pathological.

426177001.name: ECG: Sinus Bradycardia
426177001.description: A slower than normal heart rate originating from the sinus node.

426627000.name: ECG: Bradycardia
426627000.description: A slower than normal heart rate, which may be due to various causes.

426783006.name: ECG: Sinus Rhythm
426783006.description: A normal heart rhythm originating from the sinus node.

427084000.name: ECG: Sinus Tachycardia
427084000.description: A faster than normal heart rate originating from the sinus node.

427172004.name: ECG: Premature Ventricular Contractions
427172004.description: Early heartbeats originating from the ventricles, often benign.

427393009.name: ECG: Sinus Arrhythmia
427393009.description: A variation in heart rate that occurs with breathing.

445118002.name: Left Anterior Fascicular Block
445118002.description: A conduction delay in the left anterior fascicle, which may indicate underlying heart disease.

47665007.name: Right Axis Deviation
47665007.description: An EKG finding indicating a rightward shift in the electrical axis of the heart.

59931005.name: Inverted T Wave
59931005.description: Indicates possible ischemia or other cardiac conditions.

698252002.name: Non-specific Intraventricular Conduction Delay
698252002.description: Indicates a delay in the conduction system of the heart, not specific to any condition.
recommendations: Monitor and evaluate for underlying issues

713426002.name: EKG: Incomplete Right Bundle Branch Block
713426002.description: A partial blockage in the right bundle branch affecting the electrical conduction.

713427006.name: EKG: Complete Right Bundle Branch Block
713427006.description: A complete blockage in the right bundle branch affecting heart conduction.
